abstract: Unidentified man carrying sign protesting policies of Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin in Ukraine climbs onto state at Metropolitan Opera during Russian singer Anna Netrebko's curtain call at performance of Tchaikovsky's Iolanta; Netrebko has been vocal supporter of Putin; man is arrested.
lead_paragraph: A man unfurled a sign criticizing the policies of President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia as Anna Netrebko took her curtain call after performing the title role in Tchaikovsky’s “Iolanta” at the Metropolitan Opera.
snippet: A man unfurled a sign criticizing the policies of President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia as Anna Netrebko took her curtain call after performing the title role in Tchaikovsky’s “Iolanta” at the Metropolitan Opera.

headline.main: As Diva Is Cheered, Protester Climbs Onto Stage at the Met Opera
headline.print_headline: As Diva Is Cheered, Protester Climbs Onto Stage at the Met
